Motivation: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it. - Henry David Thoreau
Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going. - Sam Levenson
Stock Advice: The stock market is filled with individuals who know the price of everything but the value of nothing. - Philip Fisher
Risk comes from not knowing what you're doing. - Warren Buffett
Business Strategy: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity. - Albert Einstein
The secret of business is to know something that nobody else knows. - Aristotle Onassis
